text: Juggernaut (Cain Marko) is a Marvel Comics supervillain created by Stan Lee and Jack Kirby in 1965. ==Fictional character biography== Cain Marko is Charles Xavier's stepbrother. ==In other media== He has been played by Vinnie Jones in X-Men: The Last Stand and voiced by Ryan Reynolds in Deadpool 2. ==Internet parody== In a 2005 parody of X-Men: The Animated Series, the Juggernaut is known for cursing and saying "Don't you know who the fuck I am? I'm the Juggernaut, bitch!" The quote was well-known on YouTube that it was used in X-Men: The Last Stand. Category:Characters created by Stan Lee Category:Fictional characters introduced in the 1960s Category:Marvel Comics supervillains Category:Marvel vs. Capcom fighters
title: Juggernaut (character)
